name: Final Breath
description:
A Celtic warrior trapped within castle of Edinburgh, spurred by the Morrigan to face the monstrosity the castle resident have become, warped by an unknown force to Scottish lands

- Use different combos with your weapon to deal with new enemies

- Prepare and plan against encounters with different enemy types, and be aware of your surrounding before your overwhelmed, beyond saving yourself

- Make your way through Edinburgh castle, learn to utilize such a structure to your own ends, to deal with horde mastery, strategy and skill
Fight & Survive horde awaiting, clear house to full nature of this force it out into the opening
